name: Riverrun Digital
tagline: Flawless web and mobile app development
description:
We are a web and mobile applications design and development studio based in Guwahati, the capital city of Assam, a hilly province in the North East of India. We create stylish web sites, e-commerce platforms, SASS applications and hybrid mobile apps for clients across the globe. We are also experts in social applications, API integrations and have a penchant for writing super clean REST APIs.
Bringing awesome applications that create value for our clients and which users love to use is our passion. We are also huge fan of startups, small business development, crazy tech ideas and social media marketing.
We are adherent believers in the principles of Agile software development and as such give a very high emphasis on customer satisfaction by early and continuous delivery of useful software. We keep our clients involved in every stage of design and development processes and ensure the delivery of a working module after every cycle of development as we believe only a working software is the principal measure of progress.
We are obsessed about time, quality and style and nothing less than 100% works for us. We will only take on a job if we feel we can offer you first-class work. Complete satisfaction of our clients is the most important to us. We would love to hear about any ideas or requirements you might have.
